definition: abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
tranquility yields transcendence (idiom); quiet life of profound study/cf Still waters run deep.

sentences.chinese: 然而，寧靜並未持續很久。

sentences.english: Through self-awareness and self-knowledge only can come tranquillity and wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 通過自我意識和自知纔能有寧靜和智慧。

sentences.english: It has landscaped grounds have an open and quiet ambience.
sentences.chinese: 它具有開放的花木場寧靜氛圍。

sentences.english: I neither complain for lacking money nor hostile to riches and honour.
sentences.chinese: 淡薄名利，寧靜致遠，既不抱怨貧賤又不仇視富貴。

sentences.english: And you will find the healing you need.
sentences.chinese: 而你將會找回你尋找的那份寧靜。

sentences.english: Cross halcyon water area, you can see swim of far red glow.
sentences.chinese: 穿過寧靜的水域，你會看見遠處丹霞浮水。

sentences.english: And could the "Greek serenity" of later Greek periods be only a red sunset?
sentences.chinese: 古希臘後期的“希臘的寧靜”只能是一片落日的餘暉？

sentences.english: Will I ever again experience such peace?
sentences.chinese: 我還能再次體味這般寧靜嗎？

sentences.english: Make your personal space an oasis of calm and taste.
sentences.chinese: 讓你的個人空間成爲寧靜和品位的綠洲。

sentences.english: Advocate white is vogue, people need is involute medium halcyon.
sentences.chinese: 崇尚白色是時尚，人們需要紛亂中的寧靜。

sentences.english: It gives you peace of mind.
Every time he abutted against approached her , he felt quite peaceful .
sentences.chinese: 每次靠近她，他都覺得心很寧靜。

sentences.english: The place looked calm in the golden evening light.
sentences.chinese: 這個地方在金色的斜暉中顯得十分寧靜。

sentences.english: About ten years ago, the modern world invaded the quiet world of the Gwich'in.
sentences.chinese: 大約十年前，現代世界入侵了寧靜的哥威迅世界。

sentences.english: There will be peace and quiet in your heart.
sentences.chinese: 在你們心中將會有和平與寧靜。

sentences.english: As a poet, Xiaoya is quiet.
sentences.chinese: 作爲詩人，小雅是寧靜的。

definition: Anning District of Lanzhou City 蘭州市|兰州市[Lan2 zhou1 Shi4], Gansu/Anning City, to the west of Kunming 昆明[Kun1 ming2], Yunnan
